pymzn.MiniZincModel¶

class pymzn.MiniZincModel(mzn='')¶

Mutable class representing minizinc model.

It can use a mzn file as template, add variables and constraints, modify the solve and output statements. The output statement can also be replaced by a dzn representation of a list of output variables. The final model is a string combining the existing model (if provided) and the updates performed on the MinizincModel instance.

__init__(mzn='')¶
Parameters:mzn (str) – The minizinc problem template. It can be either the path to a mzn file or the content of a model.

Methods

__init__([mzn])
param str mzn:The minizinc problem template.
compile(output_file) Compiles the model and writes it to file.
constraint(constr[, comment]) Adds a constraint to the current model.
dzn_output_stmt([output_vars, comment]) Sets the output statement to be a dzn representation of output_vars.
output(output_stmt[, comment]) Updates the output statement of the model.
solve(solve_stmt[, comment]) Updates the solve statement of the model.
var(vartype, var[, val, comment]) Adds a variable (or parameter) to the model.
